main event: A witness in Dayton, Ohio observed a very bright circular object hovering at about 35 to 40 feet above the ground on 14 October 1955.
interesting points: The object was about 25 to 30 feet in diameter and emitted a brilliant white glow., The object remained stationary for a few minutes before rising at a slight angle and disappearing rapidly., The witness reported no sound, exhaust fumes, or flames associated with the object., The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The witness was considered reliable and seemed to have no reason to lie.
witness description: a male witness driving along Hoover Park
